assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: CMSH, AOB, AES, DLK, CJN, KLF, SSE, SBS, KTB, CAC, PTR, AEW, EABZ, DW, and HA disclose no conflict of interest. RJHS directs the MORL, which offers TGE + MPS as a clinical diagnostic test for hearing loss.
